text: Elizabeth Welter Wilson (April 4, 1921 - May 9, 2015) was a Tony Award-winning American actress. She appeared in movies such as Picnic (1955), The Goddess (1958), The Tunnel of Love (1958), A Child Is Waiting (1963), The Birds (1963), The Graduate (1967), Catch-22 (1970), The Day of the Dolphin (1973), The Prisoner of Second Avenue (1975), 9 to 5 (1980), Grace Quigley (1985), Regarding Henry (1991), The Addams Family (1991), Quiz Show (1994), and Hyde Park on Hudson (2012). Wilson was born on April 4, 1921, in Grand Rapids, Michigan. She was of English and German ancestry. She was elected to the Theatre Hall of Fame in 2007. Wilson died at her home in New Haven, Connecticut, aged 94. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1921 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Grand Rapids, Michigan Category:Tony Award winning actors
title: Elizabeth Wilson
